__e: Do you think Cat Grant would've handed over her entire company to someone she didn't truly believe in?
Didn't seem right for the world to lose Cat Grant's mind.
I went to work for Cat Grant because I thought, that would be the way that I could make a difference. But, instead, I just fetch the coffee.
Okay, I know, but when you read it, and then when you think about all that Cat and Vincent have been through, why they're together... it's hard not to believe.
I'm just suggesting that you think long and hard about what's really going on here, Cat, and, maybe more importantly, for how long it's been going on.
I'm sorry, but everything that's been going on with Cat and Vincent, there hasn't been time.
Well, Cat doesn't tell me anything... ever, so I might as well hear it from you.
You know, after what happened with Cat, it probably wasn't the best idea to bring someone back.
Because the first thing out of your mouth was, "Cat doesn't know, right?"
